title: Axenic eSports Team Recruitment
body:
Hi summoners, 

Axenic eSports is a upcoming league team that is currently looking for players to recruit to the team. We are looking for upcoming and committed high ranked talent to join the roster. If you have a passion for league and a dream of being a successful player, then this is the team for you. This organisation will help push you to your goal. Here at Axenic we are committed to becoming the most successful and best team we possibly can. 

If you are interested in joining and placed platinum III or higher his season, please go ahead and fill out the application form that has been attached via link. 
If you are a successful applicant you will be contacted via email. ( if you are lower then the cut off rank, there is still a chance for you to be accepted as a player, coach or sub. as long as you are determined and willing to improve). 

All applicants will be finalised by the 14th of December!

Thank you, from Jessica

replies.body:
Hi, I signed up on the form that you linked but I haven't received any word about the trials coming up. Just wondering why this is the case. I've also added jibsy on the LoL client to enquire further into this.

Cheers.
